text: The Donald Gray Memorial Cup is the premier men's football (soccer) competition in Southland, New Zealand. ==Past winners== * 1950 - Brigadiers * 1951 - Brigadiers * 1952 - Brigadiers * 1953 - Brigadiers & Invercargill Thistle * 1954 - Brigadiers * 1955 - Invercargill Thistle * 1956 - Brigadiers * 1957 - Hotspurs * 1958 - Brigadiers * 1959 - Rovers * 1960 - Invercargill Thistle * 1961 - Invercargill Thistle * 1962 - Invercargill Thistle * 1963 - Invercargill Thistle * 1964 - Invercargill Thistle * 1965 - Invercargill Thistle * 1966 - Invercargill Thistle * 1967 - Invercargill United * 1968 - Invercargill United * 1969 - Invercargill Thistle * 1970 - Invercargill Thistle * 1971 - Invercargill Thistle * 1972 - Invercargill Thistle & Invercargill United * 1973 - Invercargill Thistle * 1974 - Southland Boys High School * 1975 - Southland Boys High School * 1976 - Invercargill Thistle * 1977 - Invercargill Thistle * 1978 - Queens Park A.F.C. * 1979 - Old Boys * 1980 - Invercargill United * 1981 - Invercargill United * 1982 - Invercargill Thistle * 1983 - Gore Wanderers * 1984 - Invercargill Thistle * 1985 - Old Boys * 1986 - Waihopai * 1987 - Southland Marist * 1988 - Old Boys * 1989 - Queens Park A.F.C. * 1990 - Invercargill Thistle * 1991 - Invercargill United * 1992 - Queens Park A.F.C. * 1993 - Invercargill Thistle * 1994 - Queenstown Rovers * 1995 - Queenstown Rovers * 1996 - Queenstown Rovers * 1997 - Invercargill United * 1998 - Southend United * 1999 - Queenstown Rovers * 2000 - Queenstown Rovers * 2001 - Waihopai * 2002 - Waihopai * 2003 - Waihopai * 2004 - Queens Park A.F.C. * 2005 - Southend United * 2006 - Queens Park A.F.C. * 2007 - Southend United * 2008 - Queens Park A.F.C. * 2009 - Old Boys * 2010 - Old Boys * 2011 - Old Boys * 2012 - Old Boys ==External links== *Southland Football Trophy Recipients Category:Association football cup competitions in New Zealand
title: Donald Gray Memorial Cup
